attributes.action: Block the Knighthood of Tony Blair
attributes.additional_details: When people with power can chose to whom they extend that power that is a tyranny. When people decide who can weild power that is democracy.
attributes.background: Allow citizens to determine the worthiness of Knighthood candidates

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments, including requests for individuals to be given or not given particular honours.

We could accept a petition calling for the process for granting knighthoods to be changed, so that this cannot happen if a certain number of objections are made against a knighthood being granted.
